scripts.build:prod: node build.js; browserify dist/js/raw.js > dist/js/browserified.js; echo 'browserified'; babel dist/js/browserified.js --presets=env > dist/js/index.js; echo 'babelified'; uglifyjs --screw-ie8 --compress=dead_code,evaluate,loops,unused dist/js/index.js > dist/js/index.min.js; echo 'uglified'
scripts.build: node build.js; browserify dist/js/raw.js > dist/js/browserified.js; echo 'browserified'; babel dist/js/browserified.js --presets=env > dist/js/index.min.js; echo 'babelified'
scripts.build:fast: node build.js; browserify dist/js/raw.js > dist/js/index.min.js; echo 'browserified';
